content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [Roleplay] I had this conversation with Mr. Peter Schmidt, the potential landlord of the apartment I was interested in.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: [Roleplay] The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Roleplay] The final price was not agreed upon.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Roleplay] The likeability of the negotiation partner is not relevant to the conversation provided.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Roleplay] There was no indication of discrimination or offense in the provided conversation.
name: Max Müller
